message: Stuck on the roof at Andheri station, water level rising fast! Need immediate rescue. #MumbaiFloods
Family of 4 trapped in our car near Nagpur bridge. My son is having trouble breathing. Urgent medical help needed!
We are safe but running out of food and water in our building at Lokhandwala Complex. Need supplies for 20 people.
Minor flooding in our area, but we have an elderly person who needs to be moved to a shelter. Location: JVPD scheme.
A building has collapsed near the old post office in Dadar. Heard people screaming. Urgent help required!
Huge tree has fallen on the main road at Marine Drive, blocking all traffic. Infrastructure problem.
Need shelter for my family of 5. Our home in Bandra is completely flooded.
